duties_responsibilities.duty: Operate and troubleshoot equipment in the Utilities section of the site.
Conduct forklift inspections and operate forklift.
Identify and communicate unsafe behaviors, conditions, and spills.
Handle, move, inspect, and assist in the management of hazardous waste.
Follow permit procedures for confined space, hot work, and line break.
Successfully pass required examinations pertaining to Waste Water collection and treatment.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalent (Associate's degree in a relevant field preferred)
